Introduction

SS501 is a South Korean boy group formed by DSP Media. The group officially debuted on June 8, 2005, with their debut single 1st SS501. Known for their harmonized vocals and diverse musical styles, SS501 quickly gained popularity in South Korea and across Asia. The five-member group actively promoted as a unit until 2010, when the members parted ways with DSP Media upon contract expiration. While the group has remained on indefinite hiatus since then, members have occasionally reunited for special performances and continue to express interest in future group activities.
